snippet: Tuareg rebels who overran much of northern Mali after disaffected soldiers toppled the government in the south declared an independent state called Azawad on Friday.

byline.original: By LYDIA POLGREEN and ALAN COWELL

lead_paragraph: Tuareg rebels who overran much of northern Mali after disaffected soldiers toppled the government in the south declared an independent state called Azawad on Friday.

headline.seo: Mali Rebels Proclaim Independent State in North
headline.main: Mali Rebels Proclaim Independent State in North
headline.print_headline: Mali Rebels Proclaim Independent State in North
